Essential Nutrition Actions: improving maternal, newborn, infant and young child health and nutrition
3. The impact on whom is being 
estimated? 
The aim of this work is to provide evidence for attribution of changes in nutritional outcomes to 
programme activities. For this, it is necessary to define precisely whose nutritional outcome is 
being assessed, that is, whether the outcome refers to the participants or to the overall population
